markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Stargazer's Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=4066) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 82

**Archetype** [Oatia Skysage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=199)

**Prerequisites**
[Oatia Skysage Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4064)

</column>

---

Long hours in darkened observatories have sharpened your senses. If you don't have [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416) or [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), you gain low-light vision, or if you already have low-light vision, you gain darkvision.

**Special** You can take this feat a second time, upgrading your low-light vision to darkvision.
name: Stargazer's Eyes
